description:
net/http: Set TLSClientConfig.ServerName on every HTTP request.

This makes SNI "just work" for callers using the standard http.Client.

messages.text:
On 2012/08/15 18:47:39, dborowitz wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:agl@golang.org, mailto:dsymonds@golang.org (cc:
> mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

Ugh, I'm dropping this change and will mail a new one, sorry for the inconvenience.
I don't think that I know net/http well enough to be able to say LGTM, but this looks sane.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On 2012/08/15 18:37:31, Dave Borowitz wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:agl@golang.org, mailto:dsymonds@golang.org (cc:
> mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

Oops, my hg repo is screwed up.

Either I have something wrong with my ~/.hgrc, or http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html is wrong about the codereview extension disabling hg submit...

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, agl@golang.org, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, agl@golang.org, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
